item.title: Visual Studio Code Shortcut Collapse All Files in Explorer
item.description: Visual Studio Code - Shortcut Collapse all files in explorer I wanted a keyboard shortcut to collapse the open folders in the VSCode Explorer and ctrl + left-arrow wasnt working. To examine all VSCode keyboard shortcuts, use: ctrl + K ctrl + S Stackoverflow pointed the way with the answer provided by user Fluous. He says that the left-arrow shortcut only works when the Explorer window has the focus. Therefore, Fluous suggests, combine two standard shortcuts to get the desired behaviour.
